attributes.action: Making the death penalty illegal worldwide
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to help abolish the death penalty due to fact innocent lives have been lost and people who deserve to suffer in prison are avoiding this.
attributes.background: We would like government to take the idea of the death penalty being illegal worldwide to the United Nations the be put to a vote. We would like them to advocate the idea.

rejection.details: The UK Government do not have the power to make the death penalty illegal worldwide.
